data.name: ball-e
data.detailed_description:
Become the one and only legendary Ninja Ball Warrior in ball-e!

Parcour through traps and obstacles! Don't be too slow or you will be punished!



The enemy? Yourself and an angry bot that will do anything to stop you from getting to the top!
Gather Upgrades and unlock new Abilities on your way up.

Are you scratching your head about who put all these random items all over the place? Don't worry about it!

Just smash into them or hang out on one of those really comfy couches.
Just relax and let your legs rest! That is if you had any!



You will never see the same parcour more than once as every level is procedurally generated.
Be faster than anyone else and claim the title of the legendary Ninja Ball Warrior!

data.short_description: ball-e is a singleplayer platformer with roguelike elements. Parcour through procedurally generated obstacles and traps and gain new abilities on the way to become the legendary Ninja Ball Warrior! Don't let anyone stop you, because they will always find a way!
